name: Cusano - M1 Connecticut Bundle - Robusto
additionalNotes: The Cusano brand owes its popularity to creating affordable premium handmade cigars that rival the quality and taste of costlier brands, and the M1 Bundle is a prime example of how this feat was accomplished. Known for their fuller bodied blends, Cusano went on the mellow side with this one. And, to compete with many of the high-end Dominican cigars, the M1 uses the classic combination of Dominican fillers nestled inside a blonde-hued Ecuadorian Connecticut-seed wrapper. For some extra Cuban-style gusto, the Cusano M1 uses a double binder process that uniquely reinforces its overall construction and bumps the complexity up a notch while still remaining mellow in body and strength.
